answers.answer: They told me I had pre-ecclampsia with my now five year old daughter...they told me while I was in labor and I still have no idea what it means... good question, wish I could help :)
High blood pressure, protein or something in urine. I nevef had it, but a girl i went to school with did. She sadly passed away about a year ago. Her doctor never caught it.
Ita very serious if untreated while pregnant.
Thanks :/ my bp has sky rocketed this week and I'm painfully swollen and puking have been for a good week. I can't tell if it's normal pregnancy junk or something serious

If your next doc app is awhile away. I would call and try to get one sooner. Ask about being tested! I would call tomorrow if i was you. If your doc wont be in. Maybe try to call a nurse at the hospital and get advice.
I'm going to call tomorrow I'd go in but I have an appointment on Tuesday and I'm prepared to ask a million questions. Thank you!
Your welcome good luck! I hope all goes well

My cousin had pre eclampsia.  High blood pressure. Swollen hands feet eyes. They diagnosed her with protein in her urine. She ended up having her baby one month early and the baby has to stay in tge hospital for a month. She and baby are very healthyy

I suffered with eclampsia sevrely everything was swallen, extreme high blood pressure of 205/107 im only 19 by the way, i had an emergancy c-section at 31 weeks 5 days, u had a scan and my placenta stopped working so he was better out than in, its life threating and needs to be treated straight away. My baby was 2lbs he is 6 months old and now weights 13lbs, woman give birth to 12lbs babies so u can imagine how small my 6 month old is. Im 13 weeks pregnant and the same will happen again but this time imhaving a planned c-section and im 100 more comfortable and feel safer as i know what to look out for, the risks, etc... And i will be in the best place, u will have to be on bed rest aswell just to let u know! Good luck hope u and ur baby r ok x
My baby was in hospital for 2 months so depends on how well your baby is.
My mom had it with me. I was born a month or two early and stayed in hospital for about a month.  It only shows up in the 3rd tri. And you can gey blood tests for find out if u have it.

I had pre eclampsia with my first son who is now six. My blood pressure was extremely high, abd I was very swollen. They induced me at 36w6d. I laboured for hours apon hours for them to realize my pelvic bone was to slender to ever get a baby out (something they should've checked for prior to being induced) baby's heartbeat dropped, oxygen was low & I was passing out from the pain since my epidural had LONG wore off.  They rushed me in for a c section & strapped me down & started my c section with no epidural no medicine NOTHING. I felt everything until I went into shock a couple minutes later & once he was out they knocked me out.  Said it was life or death for Both of us so that's why they didn't give me medicine. It was horrible.  Please if you think you have it get checked right away.

I had it with the fist baby and was sent to the hospital right when they saw I had it! I got induced and was in labor for A LONG TIME..so I had to get c-section! Most women get past preeclampsia with no problem...and other do not :/ depends on how bad you have it! I had it really bad!

At my doctor appointments before they do anything they have me pee on a stick that has colored boxes and if it turns certain colors they know I have protein in my urine. I would ask your doctor about it

I am 31 wks. My BP has been high since 20 wks. My OB mentions pre eclampsia starting next week i have to go to the hospital twice a week and my regular OB app once a week so they can monitor my baby. But im doing all i can to keep it low as possible.

question: Has anyone had this? If so what were your symptoms and how did you know? Did youhave to deliver early?
title: preeclampsia-please help!
